CoronaViz: A directory of COVID-19 data visualization

    Informationssammlung zum Thema CoVid-19

    Umfassende Linksammlung von Dashboards, Lageinformationen, Checklisten. Außerdem Links zu Diagnostik-Themen und Erlassen der Länder.

    https://github.com/cwoomi/cert-covid19

    How much toilet paper?

    The simple calculator for how much toilet paper you need to survive the pandemic

    https://howmuchtoiletpaper.com/

    Coronavirus COVID-19 Global Cases Map by Johns Hopkins University

    Developed to provide researchers, public health authorities, and the general public with a user-friendly tool to track the outbreak as it unfolds.

    https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/map.html

    Pandemic Footprint Index

    Determine your personal Pandemic Footprint* and find out how every single one of us can contribute to contain the global Covid-19 Pandemic.

    https://www.pandemic-footprint.com/
Made by Thomas Puppe. Available on GitHub.
